labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You get reconnected to the other user without doing anything
data.expected_result: Client does not reconnect call after this long time
data.short_description: Discord call reconnects when your computer awakens from sleep
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a DM call - Put your computer to sleep - Call will eventually disconnect on the other user's side - Leave your computer in sleep mode for over an hour - let computer resume from sleep for updates
